channel.title: Server help
channel.description:
just a few things i was wondering how to do for my server...
It would be cool If i could change the shop item's price i havnt really figured that one out yet
Also how can i weaken the npcs i think they seem to be a little too strong as of now.
and what do i have to add for mods and admins when right clicking on players to have options to kick ban and ip ban?
IF anyone knows please tell

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Keasho Keasho
item.description:
@Keasho wrote:

thanks so much for all you help! apprecaite it deeply… the outStream.writeString(“Kick”);
can be found in my client but i can live without it

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

[Shop Prices]-
open up item.cfg
find the item you wish to change(ctrl+f)
the first 3 numbers are
1.shop value
2.alch value
3.alch value
the rest are 5 attack 5 defence 1 str 1 pray in that order

[Weaken NPCs]-
open up npc.cfg
find your npc
there will be 2 numbers after the NPCs name
1st. Combat
2nd. HP
change the hp
and maybe, in npchandler.java, someone set it to have a hitdiff
if they did, change it to what you want

[Right-Click Options]-
search for
outStream.writeString(“Kick”);
thats where the options are delt with
mess with it, GL
^sorry thats all i can say

post again if you get any problems
hope ive helped

Read full topic
